text: Enhancing human-AI interactions through the application of artificial empathy strategies has emerged as a key area in developing more responsive and empathetic technology. This study delves into the optimization of human-AI interactions by employing artificial empathy strategies to enhance affective and social customer experiences. Using a qualitative research approach, the study reviews a range of studies and literature relevant to the topic, drawing insights from journals, articles, and books. The research findings highlight the significant potential of artificial empathy strategies in improving the quality of interactions and customer experiences within human-AI interactions. Technologies such as natural language processing, emotion recognition, and sentiment analysis play a crucial role in enabling AI to respond accurately and sensitively to user needs and emotions.
